resources.string: With this tool you can request icons for apps that are missing from icon packs.
Select this option if you think one of your apps should have an icon, but doesn\'t, or if some of your icons broke after an update. You only need to copy and paste some text for this option.
Select this option if you want to submit new icons. You will have to submit a file with your icon request.
There are no email clients installed.
Make sure you copied your icon list into the assets folder.
No apps selected. Select at least one app.
Some app icons are missing on my device.\n\n
